attributes.action: To Stop the proposed march through Wootton Bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: wootton bassett because of its location is the first town our fallen pass through when they return home. the govement needs to show respect to them and there families by protecting the people of this town from the anger and violence a march of this type will generate.i do not believe that decent people would want this disrespectful march.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
